thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-WSE Resolves To Suspend Trading Of A Number Of Companies From NewConnect

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-WSE Resolves To Suspend Trading Of A Number Of Companies From NewConnect
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - WARSAW STOCK EXCHANGE (WSE):
* RESOLVED ON THURSDAY TO SUSPEND SHARES OF THE FOLLOWING COMPANIES IN TRADING ON NEWCONNECT MARKET AS THEY DID NOT PUBLISHED THEIR Q4 REPORTS: ADMIRAL BOATS SA, CENTRUM WSPIERANIA PROJEKTOW EUROPEJSKICH SA, INFOSYSTEMS SA , LZMO SA, NAVIMOR INVEST SA AND TERMO2POWER SA
Source text: bit.ly/2EKpvSd
Further company coverage:,,, ,, (Gdynia Newsroom)
